arts.ttl: Como vs. Verona: three points needed
arts.sum: Last season`s 3-2 victory marked Como`s first home win upon their return to Serie A after a 23-year absence. Verona have never won in Como across seven Serie A meetings: three home victories and four draws.

Como come into this match having drawn 0-0 with Parma at the weekend to extend their unbeaten run to seven games. Como have one of the strongest defences in the division conceding just five goals in t...

arts.ttl: Como vs. Hellas Verona - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Serie A clash between Como and Hellas Verona, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
